keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ending austerity to invest in public services and provide jobs
Investing in renewable energy to tackle climate change
Bringing the NHS and public services into public hands
Ensuring creativity in learning and holistic child and youth development
A fair economy that doesn't bring people into debt

issues.economy: A fair economy that doesn't bring people into debt
issues.education: Ensuring creativity in learning and holistic child and youth development
issues.environment: Investing in renewable energy to tackle climate change; Supporting local, organic food production
issues.health: Bringing the NHS and public services into public hands
issues.socialWelfare: Ending austerity to invest in public services and provide jobs

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been a teacher in and around Sheffield for 21 years. All public services are being squeezed - ideologically-driven austerity and the stripping of assets to bankers. What's right for people, have damaged the NHS and Social Services.

images.caption: PETER GARBUTT smiling in front of a cityscape
